attributes.action: issue all Police Community Support Officers with a stab proof vest, for their day-to-day protection.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please provide the funds to issue every Community Support Officer in the Country with a stab vest. It is a fact that not all forces issue their PCSO's with such equipment. 

We all know that PCSO's are out on the streets for long periods, dealing with some violent citizens that carry weapons.

Please can this be given some serious thought. 

Many thanks in advance.
